Protein Names: Glutathione biosynthesis bifunctional protein GshAB (Gamma-GCS-GS) (GCS-GS) [Includes: Glutamate--cysteine ligase (EC 6.3.2.2) (Gamma-ECS) (GCS) (Gamma-glutamylcysteine synthetase); Glutathione synthetase (EC 6.3.2.3) (GSH synthetase) (GS) (GSH-S) (GSHase) (Glutathione synthase)]
Organism: Listeria welshimeri serovar 6b (strain ATCC 35897 / DSM 20650 / CIP 8149 / NCTC 11857 / SLCC 5334 / V8)
